data.title: Dirty. Loud. Lazy, clueless staff. Pretty much everything that makes fast food a bad experience can be found here.
data.text:
We went to this EPL recently for a quick dinner. It was FILTHY. The counter in front of the condiments was covered with spilled sauces and other detritus. Every table that I was able to check was dirty. The manager was having some kind of intense conversation with two employees in the corner and the counter staff was standing around doing nothing to address the dirtiness of the store. I used to really like EPL, but nearly every time I have gone to one of the locations near my home, I left disappointed or downright angry. I could see this if it was really, really cheap, but EPL is one of  the most expensive fast food restaurants around. 

Get your act together EPL. Fullerton (Othorpe), Placentia (Plac Ave) and YL Stores are terrible! They are nearly always dirty, the tea dispensers are frequently empty, staff is surley/lazy. You are on a downhill slide.

data.title: I Quit Coming Here
data.text: I guess title says it all.  Very tight drive thru, slow, got my order wrong, chicken didn't seem cooked all the way. I'll pass I should be eating at home anyway....

data.title: Great
data.text: We have an El Pollo Loco dinner about once a week. Good, relatively healthy convenient fast food. The drive through line gets backed up several times a day and you never know what you'll find when you drive in. We try to go just before the dinner rush. The food seems fresher when we do. The inside I soften very busy and sometimes messy.

data.title: If you dont have these at home stop and eat at one
data.text: Pollo Loco or Crazy Chicken as I like to call them is a great go-to place for some fast and healthy chicken.  I love the tostadas as well as the pollo bowls.  Can't really go wrong here.  The fire grilled chicken ii absolutely delicious.

data.title: Average
data.text: Just average for a Mexican Restaurant in my books. Nothing was bad but nothing was great -- just okay.

data.title: UGH!
data.text: UGH!  Not good at all.   Meat was like shoe leather. The dining area was messy.  The preparation area was in a bit of confusion and disarray.  Won't go back.
